plot: Nick Giannopoulos, star of the films 'The Wog Boy' and 'The Wannabes' takes you on an all expenses paid trip of his ancestral home, Greece.
title: Greece Is the Word
plot_es: Nick Giannopoulos, star of the films 'The Wog Boy' and 'The Wannabes' takes you on an all expenses paid trip of his ancestral home, Greece.
